price: (29) So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.
arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-aʿriḍ ʿan man tawallā ʿan dhik'rinā walam yurid illā al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
